posts.title: What is the worth of SILENCE?
posts.body: This is important because SUSTAINABILITY is achieved only if you build both. For example: Did the Roman truly destroyed the second temple? The Answer is NO - because they were never able to destroy the upper temple which is our faith. That is why we survived for 2000 years without a temple.
posts.author: Mark Lavi

posts.title: Lag BaOmer - Light a candle to Rabbi Shimon and make your request
posts.body: At the yortzeit day of a Tzaddik, G-d invites the Tzaddick to Gan Eden and fulfills his requests at the presence of other Tzaddikim. This is why we celebrate the Hillulah (death anniversary) of a Tzaddick – it's the time they get blessings from G-d to give us. In the Tzaddick’s merit those who mention his name (and light a candle), get a blessing from G-d too. This is why we try to connect to tzaddikim.
